name: Import employees as resources - vPlan
description:
Automatically create a new resource in vPlan whenever a new entry is added to a Google Sheet. This template enables you to import and maintain your resources in a clear and structured way, including assigned workdays and schedules.

The scenario is delivered in a simple, ready-to-use configuration and can be easily extended with additional attributes or logic. Once imported, the resources are immediately available in vPlan, ensuring accurate planning and seamless integration between your spreadsheet and vPlan environment.
